verses.roman:
kvacid rajāṁsi vimame
pārthivāny uru-janmabhiḥ
guṇa-karmābhidhānāni
na me janmāni karhicit

synonyms: kvacit—at some time; rajāṁsi—the particles of dust; vimame—one might count; pārthivāni—on the earth; uru-janmabhiḥ—in many lifetimes; guṇa—qualities; karma—activities; abhidhānāni—and names; na—not; me—My; janmāni—births; karhicit—ever.
translation: After many lifetimes someone might count the dust particles on the earth, but no one can ever finish counting My qualities, activities, names and births.
